message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to negotiate further. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to you.
